scripts.dev: cp tools/index.dev.html app/index.html && cp tools/authSuccess.html app/authSuccess.html && webpack -w
scripts.release: rm -f app/sculptgl.js.map && cp tools/index.release.html app/index.html && cp tools/authSuccess.html app/authSuccess.html && webpack --env.release
scripts.standalone: yarn buildElectron && cd standalone && node buildStandalone.js
